rules.install:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
install -d -m 0755 "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/pam.d"
install -m 644 "$BOLT_WORK_DIR/extra/etc/pam.conf" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/" install -m 644 "$BOLT_WORK_DIR/extra/etc/pam.d/other" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/etc/pam.d/"
cd "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" mv sbin usr/ mv lib usr/
